descriptions: Student does not participate or their contributions are completely irrelevant to the conversation.
Student participates minimally with contributions that are sometimes relevant.
Student participates occasionally with mostly relevant contributions.
Student participates regularly with relevant contributions, showing engagement with the topic.
Student actively participates with insightful and relevant contributions, enhancing the conversation.
Student leads the conversation with highly insightful, relevant, and thought-provoking contributions.
Student is unable to ask or answer simple questions.
Student struggles to ask or answer simple questions with frequent errors.
Student can ask and answer simple questions but with some errors.
Student asks and answers a variety of questions in transactional settings with minor errors.
Student confidently asks and answers a variety of questions in both transactional and informal settings.
Student skillfully asks and answers complex questions, demonstrating a strong command of the language in various settings.
Student does not attempt to clarify understanding or negotiate meaning.
Student attempts to clarify understanding but struggles to negotiate meaning effectively.
Student sometimes seeks clarification and negotiates meaning with limited success.
Student generally clarifies understanding and negotiates meaning effectively in simple exchanges.
Student effectively clarifies understanding and negotiates meaning in a variety of situations.
Student expertly clarifies understanding, anticipates potential misunderstandings, and skillfully negotiates meaning in complex conversations.
Student does not use technology or uses it inappropriately.
Student attempts to use technology but struggles or uses it ineffectively.
Student uses technology for collaboration and sharing information with limited success.
Student uses technology appropriately to collaborate and share information effectively.
Student effectively uses technology to enhance collaboration, share information, and express opinions.
Student innovatively uses technology to enhance collaboration, share information, express opinions, and create new possibilities in communication.
